description: Supine RDI at 5% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 5% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi5ps  = 60*(hrembp5 + hnrbp5 + carbp5 + canbp5 + oarbp5 + oanbp5)/(remepbp+nremepbp)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Supine RDI at 5% desat
